00018 #define PM_NEAR_FAR   1
00019 #define PM_LEFT_RIGHT 2
00020 #define PM_BOTTOM_TOP 4
00021 #define PM_ALL 7
00022 
00023 enum CameraMode { cmUVN, cmYawPitchRoll, cmSpherical };
00024 
00025 class CCamera {
00026 public: 
00027         CCamera();
00028         ~CCamera();
00029 
00030          void InitView(float fNear, float fFar, float fFov, float fViewAspect);
00031          void BuildMatrix(CameraMode cmMode);
00032          void CalcPlanes();
00033          bool IsPointInFrustum(const POINT3D& pt, int iPlaneMode = PM_ALL);
00034          bool IsSphereInFrustum(const POINT3D& pt, float fRadius, int iPlaneMode = PM_ALL);
00035          
00036          void SetNewFov(float fFov) { InitView(m_fNear, m_fFar, fFov, 1.0f/m_fAspectRatioInv); }
00037          float GetFov() { return m_fFov; }
00038 
00039          // additional:
00040          void CalcFrustumPoints(POINT3D *pFPoints);
00041          void DrawFrustum();
00042 
00043          // inline methods:
00044          void SetProjectionMatrix() { 
00045                  glFrustum(-m_fViewplaneW*0.5f, m_fViewplaneW*0.5f, -m_fViewplaneH*0.5f, m_fViewplaneH*0.5f, 
00046                                m_fViewDistance, m_fFar); 
00047          }
00048          void SetViewMatrix() { 
00049                  gluLookAt(m_vPos.x, m_vPos.y, m_vPos.z, 
00050                                m_vTarget.x, m_vTarget.y, m_vTarget.z, 
00051                                    m_vUp.x, m_vUp.y, m_vUp.z); 
00052          }
00053 
00054     // variables:
00055         VECTOR3D m_vPos;
00056         VECTOR3D m_vTarget;
00057         VECTOR3D m_vUp;
00058         float m_fYaw;   // y axis, in radians
00059         float m_fPitch; // x axis, in radians
00060         float m_fRoll;  // z axis, in radians
00061         float m_fRad;   // radius of the sphere, used in cmSpherical cam mode
00062 private:
00063         PLANE3D m_pNear;
00064         PLANE3D m_pFar;
00065         PLANE3D m_pRight;
00066         PLANE3D m_pLeft;
00067         PLANE3D m_pBottom;
00068         PLANE3D m_pTop;
